mapper.sql: pid, process, begindt, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, countnum
mapper.delete: delete from excel11data where begindt BETWEEN #{beginDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into excel11data(pid, process, begindt, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, countnum) values (#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{value1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert.foreach:
insert into excel11data (
) SELECT #{item.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.value1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM excel11data WHERE begindt= #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR} LIMIT 1 )

update excel11data
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
